title: Complete Project Proposal
description: Draft a detailed project proposal including scope and deliverables.

title: Setup Development Environment
description: Install necessary software tools and libraries for development.

title: Implement Backend API
description: Create RESTful API endpoints for the backend server.

title: Design User Interface
description: Sketch wireframes and design user interface elements.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Plan and create database schema for the application.

title: Frontend Components Development
description: Develop reusable React components for frontend views.

title: Implement Authentication
description: Integrate user authentication and authorization features.

title: Deploy Application to Server
description: Deploy the application to a cloud server for production use.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive user documentation and guides.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Conduct rigorous testing to ensure application stability and performance.
